name: Solitaires Premium
description:
Solitaires Premium collects eleven of the world most popular solitaires in a single ad-free game.

Features:
♠️ zoom in and out
♠️ high resolution cards,
♠️ full tablet support,
♠️ eleven top solitaires with three to four variations each,
♠️ score,
♠️ undo,
♠️ moving cards is optimised for touch screens,
♠️ smooth animations,
♠️ autosave.

We've gathered all our best solitaires into this one app. Enjoy!
